pages.text: The $(b)Alchemical Catalyst$() is the cornerstone of magical crafting. It stores $(violet)10,000 mana$() and is required for most advanced recipes.$(br2)To create one:$(br)• Get a $(#)Blaze Sack$() (craft from 9 blaze powder)$(br)• Find an $(#)Amethyst Cluster$()$(br)• Right-click the cluster with the Blaze Sack
Craft 9 blaze powder into a Blaze Sack.

pages.title: Transmutation
pages.text: $(l)Amethyst Cluster Transmutation:$()$(br2)• Hold a $(#)Blaze Sack$() in your hand$(br)• Right-click an $(#)Amethyst Cluster$()$(br)• The cluster is consumed$(br)• Receive 1 $(violet)Alchemical Catalyst$()$(br2)The catalyst can be recharged by right-clicking it while holding ender pearls or echo shards.
